backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, public and private messages, authorization checks, FAQs, and timestamp-based message fetching.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like summary map describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark-mode theme with OKLCH variables and RTL-friendly base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling Persian language and RTL layout, loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and page rendering under a dark theme provider.
Component that checks admin status and either renders children or shows an access-denied alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen with Persian UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication and shows a branded welcome view.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing authentication flow, query cache clearing, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter a name, saving profiles with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Renders the app header with login button, optional username greeting, and brand logo/title.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Provides a textarea and send button for composing chat messages with Enter-to-send behavior and async send handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Displays chat messages with user/bot avatars, alignment based on author, and localized timestamps.
frontend/src/components/chat/HeartbeatPi: Shows a visual indicator of pipeline step status with icons, animations, and optional dismiss action.
frontend/src/components/external-knowled: Fetches and displays a Wikipedia summary for a query, handling loading, errors, and link to full article.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, content area, and footer, adapting options for admins.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, messages, FAQ interactions, admin checks, and chat stats using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useWikipediaSummary.t: Fetches a Wikipedia summary for a search query using the MediaWiki API and caches results with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining dark and light theme variables for colors, layout, and UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/mamaBrain.ts: Implements deterministic FAQ or empathetic response generation with simple hashing and structured feedback.
frontend/src/lib/mamaPipeline.ts: Runs a 7‑step message‑processing pipeline with keyboard correction, FAQ lookup, emotional analysis, and response selection.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFaqImportP: Provides an admin interface to batch‑import FAQ items with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat UI handling sending messages, running the Mama pipeline, showing feedback, and managing private/public chat modes.
frontend/src/pages/MamaBrainPage.tsx: Renders a descriptive page of the Mama Brain architecture with module cards and a story section.
frontend/src/pages/TransparencyPage.tsx: Displays system transparency stats and recent public messages with refreshable metrics.
frontend/src/utils/chatErrors.ts: Utility for extracting readable error info and producing sanitized debug logs for chat operations.
frontend/src/utils/perf.ts: Development‑only performance measurement helpers for timing async and sync operations.
frontend/src/utils/persianKeyboardCorrec: Auto‑detects and converts English‑layout Persian typing into correct Persian characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system using OKLCH variables, custom fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for the Persian AI chatbot «ماما», including vision, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
